Ready2Frag  -  The host you can depend on.​

Our promotional VPS offers are nearing their end! We are going to be doing a major reconstruction of our VPS services to offer more virtualization types (OpenVZ as well as our existing KVM), even better hardware, and more!​



WHO WE ARE, WHAT WE DO, AND WHY WE DO IT

Ready2Frag is a provider of performance virtual servers in the greater Chicago, IL area. We operate our own hardware, IP space, and suite in the Steadfast Networks 725 S. Wells facility in downtown Chicago.

We pride ourselves on providing affordable, high-quality hosting services. We tout years of hosting experience, skilled and knowledgeable staff, and dedication to our clients unlike any other. Unlike so many other companies, we understand that our customers are what makes our business possible - And we show our appreciation through the services and support we provide!

We utilize only the best in hardware to power our VPS services. With Supermicro chassis, Intel Xeon E3-1230v2 processors, DDR3 ECC RAM, Samsung 840 Evo SSDs in RAID-10, LSI RAID cards, and Intel networking cards, we are ready to power your dreams, work, and applications. Our usage of RAID-10 SSDs offers insane sustained I/O and speed to your apps.


Basic Features:

  • SolusVM Control Panel
  • 1Gbps Network Ports
  • Automatic Setup
  • Free DDoS Protection - 4Gbps/4MPPS
